alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:38AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, Norfolk, south central Middlesex, Bristol, northeastern Washington, Newport, eastern Kent, eastern Providence and Bristol Counties with heavy rainfall through 100 PM EDT... At 1136 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cranston, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas near Providence and Fall River. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Framingham, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Dartmouth, Cumberland, Natick, North Providence, Franklin, West Warwick, Needham, Johnston, North Attleborough and Norwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
